Information: Units: Hectares (ha). Total area of the country, including land and water.
Notes: FAO Country area: Area under national sovereignty. It is the sum of land area, inland waters and coastal waters. It excludes the exclusive economic zone.

Information: Units: # of people per household, Urban Households
Notes: No data avaiable for Barbados or Belize. NEED ASSUMPTION

Information: Total population of a country. Calculated as sum of all subpopulations ``population_$CAT-GENERAL$``.
